title: Introduction to Pole Dance
label: INTRO TO POLE
description1: Pole isn't just about tricks or aesthetics. It's a full-body strength and coordination practice that challenges you to move in three-dimensional space while building confidence and capability.
description2: In this class, we start with grip techniques, basic spins, and foundational strength positions. Safety is paramount, but so is play. You'll learn proper form for pole-specific movements while discovering what your body can do when given the right progressions and support.
